Title: Multi-Page Application Setup
Description: As a platform user, I want to navigate between different views (Builder, Studio, Agent Network) so that I can access different workflows appropriate to my task
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Three pages available: AgentBuilder, AgentBuilderV2, AgentStudio; [x] React Router navigation without page refresh; [x] Browser back/forward buttons work; [x] State persists across navigation

Title: Centralized State Management
Description: As a developer, I want centralized state management using React Context so that components can access shared data without prop drilling
Acceptance Criteria: [x] AgentNetworkContext created with 40+ state variables; [x] All components access context; [x] State updates trigger appropriate re-renders; [x] WebSocket connections managed in context; [x] Session management integrated

Title: Dark/Light Theme System
Description: As a user, I want to toggle between dark and light themes so that I can use the application comfortably in different lighting conditions
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Theme toggle button in sidebar; [x] Preference persists in localStorage; [x] All components support both themes; [x] Smooth transition animations

Title: Responsive Sidebar Navigation
Description: As a user, I want icon-based sidebar navigation so that I can quickly access different sections
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Fixed 64px sidebar with icons; [x] Icons: Networks, Library, Copilot, MCP, Settings, Theme; [x] Active state highlighting; [x] Tooltips on hover

Title: Vite Development Environment
Description: As a developer, I want fast hot-reload development environment so that I can iterate quickly
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Vite 7.2 configured; [x] Hot module replacement working; [x] Custom middleware for Python integration; [x] Proxy for backend APIs; [x] Production build optimization

Title: Cognizant Neuro AI Branding
Description: As a business stakeholder, I want Cognizant Neuro AI branding throughout the application so that the platform reflects our corporate identity
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Cognizant logo in sidebar; [x] Neuro AI branding in panels; [x] Professional minimalist design; [x] Consistent across all pages

Title: Network Discovery & Loading
Description: As a user, I want to see all available agent networks so that I can select one to work with
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Scans Neuro SAN registry on startup; [x] 50+ networks discovered; [x] Click network to load; [x] Mock fallback for offline

Title: Network Categorization
Description: As a user, I want networks organized into categories so that I can find relevant networks quickly
Acceptance Criteria: [x] 6 categories: Core, Basic, Industry, Tools, Experimental, Generated; [x] Unique icon and color per category; [x] Collapsible folders; [x] Alphabetical sorting

Title: HOCON Configuration Parser
Description: As a developer, I want HOCON files parsed to JavaScript objects so that networks can be rendered visually
Acceptance Criteria: [x] HOCON â†’ JSON parsing; [x] Agent definitions extracted; [x] Graph structure generated; [x] Error handling for invalid HOCON

Title: Network Content Viewer
Description: As a user, I want to view raw HOCON configuration so that I can understand network structure
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Display raw HOCON; [x] Scrollable text area; [x] Copy to clipboard; [x] Error messages

Title: Update Agent Instructions
Description: As a user, I want to update agent instructions so that I can customize agent behavior
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Edit agent prompts; [x] Save to HOCON file; [x] Changes persist; [x] Validation for required fields

Title: Create New Network
Description: As a user, I want to create blank networks so that I can build custom networks from scratch
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Modal for network creation; [x] Name input; [x] Generate blank template; [x] Save to file system; [x] Immediate availability

Title: Interactive Graph Visualization
Description: As a user, I want to see networks as interactive graphs so that I can understand structure visually
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Agents as node cards; [x] Connections as edges with arrows; [x] Click to select; [x] Zoom and pan; [x] Minimap navigation; [x] Smooth animations

Title: Agent Node Rendering
Description: As a user, I want agents displayed as cards so that I can identify them quickly
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Icon, name, type badge; [x] Description tooltip; [x] Color coding by type; [x] Selected state highlighting; [x] Active execution animation

Title: Automatic Graph Layout
Description: As a user, I want automatic node arrangement so that I don't manually position nodes
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Dagre algorithm applied; [x] Hierarchical layout; [x] Consistent spacing; [x] Edge routing to avoid overlaps

Title: Drag-and-Drop Positioning
Description: As a user, I want to drag nodes to reposition so that I can customize layout
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Click and drag to move; [x] Edges follow moved node; [x] Position persists; [x] Smooth animation

Title: Real-Time Execution Visualization
Description: As a user, I want to see executing agents highlighted so that I can follow execution flow
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Active agents pulsing blue ring; [x] Execution trace parsed; [x] 2-second animation; [x] Agent chain displayed

Title: Agent Context Menu
Description: As a user, I want right-click context menu so that I can perform quick actions
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Right-click opens menu; [x] Actions: View, Edit, Connect, Delete, Duplicate; [x] Click outside closes; [x] Keyboard shortcuts

Title: Configuration Drawer
Description: As a user, I want comprehensive configuration interface so that I can customize all agent aspects
Acceptance Criteria: [x] 600px right-side drawer; [x] 7 tabs: Overview, Function, Instructions, Command, Tools, MCP, Advanced; [x] Tab navigation; [x] Close button and backdrop

Title: Dynamic Function Parameters
Description: As a user, I want to manage function parameters so that I can define agent function signature
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Add/edit/remove parameters; [x] Type selection: string, integer, boolean, array, object; [x] Required toggle; [x] Validation for duplicates

Title: Instructions Editor
Description: As a user, I want to edit agent instructions so that I can define behavior in natural language
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Multiline textarea; [x] Character count; [x] Auto-resize; [x] Unsaved changes indicator

Title: Visual Tools Selection
Description: As a user, I want visual tool selection so that I can give agents capabilities
Acceptance Criteria: [x] 58+ tools as cards; [x] 12 categories; [x] Search and filter; [x] Selected badge counter

Title: MCP Servers Configuration
Description: As a user, I want to configure MCP servers so that agents connect to external services
Acceptance Criteria: [x] 9+ MCP servers; [x] Server cards with descriptions; [x] Configure parameters; [x] Test connection; [x] Status indicator

Title: LLM Configuration
Description: As a user, I want to configure LLM parameters so that I can tune response generation
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Model selection; [x] Temperature slider (0-1); [x] Max tokens input; [x] Top P, frequency penalty, presence penalty; [x] Reset to defaults

Title: Unsaved Changes Protection
Description: As a user, I want warning before losing unsaved changes so that I don't accidentally discard work
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Auto-detect unsaved changes; [x] Warning modal on agent switch; [x] Options: Keep Editing / Discard; [x] Indicator shows unsaved state

Title: Configuration Persistence
Description: As a user, I want configurations saved automatically so that changes persist across sessions
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Save to backend; [x] localStorage fallback; [x] Load on selection; [x] Delete configuration; [x] List all configs

Title: Network Designer Copilot Interface
Description: As a user, I want to describe my desired network in natural language so that AI can generate an architecture plan automatically
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Copilot panel in sidebar; [x] Text input for network requirements; [x] Submit button to generate plan; [x] Dual engine toggle; [x] Loading state during generation; [x] User-friendly error messages

Title: Gemini AI Integration
Description: As a developer, I want Gemini 2.5 Pro API integration so that AI can understand requirements and generate architectures
Acceptance Criteria: [x] API key management via environment variables; [x] Prompt engineering for network generation; [x] Structured JSON response parsing; [x] Error handling for API failures; [x] Rate limiting awareness; [x] Response validation

Title: Mermaid Diagram Generation
Description: As a user, I want to see visual diagram of proposed network so that I can understand architecture before approving
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Mermaid flowchart generated from AI plan; [x] New agents highlighted in green; [x] Existing agents in blue; [x] Connection arrows displayed; [x] Dark theme support; [x] Responsive SVG output; [x] Error handling for invalid diagrams

Title: Architecture Plan Approval Workflow
Description: As a user, I want to review and approve AI-generated plans so that I maintain control over network changes
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Plan displayed in modal dialog; [x] Show title and description and implementation steps; [x] Display Mermaid diagram preview; [x] List new and existing agents; [x] Approve button applies plan to network; [x] Reject button discards plan; [x] Close modal without applying

Title: Native Generator Integration
Description: As a user, I want to use Neuro SAN native generator so that I can leverage streaming terminal logs and direct HOCON generation
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Native engine option in copilot; [x] Streaming terminal logs displayed in real-time; [x] Direct HOCON file generation; [x] JSON-lines parsing; [x] Progress updates shown; [x] Abort support via AbortController

Title: WebSocket Chat Connection
Description: As a user, I want to chat with my agent network in real-time so that I can interact with agents and receive immediate responses
Acceptance Criteria: [x] WebSocket connection to chat endpoint; [x] Send user messages to network; [x] Receive AI responses in real-time; [x] Connection status indicator; [x] Automatic reconnection on disconnect; [x] Session ID binding for conversation continuity

Title: Chat Message Rendering
Description: As a user, I want messages formatted with Markdown so that code blocks and lists and formatted text are readable
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Markdown rendering with react-markdown; [x] Code blocks with syntax highlighting; [x] User messages right-aligned with distinct styling; [x] AI messages left-aligned; [x] Timestamps displayed for each message; [x] Auto-scroll to latest message

Title: Execution Logs Streaming
Description: As a user, I want to see execution logs in real-time so that I can understand what agents are doing during execution
Acceptance Criteria: [x] WebSocket connection to logs endpoint; [x] Log entries displayed as they arrive; [x] Execution trace parsed and displayed; [x] Token accounting shown per message; [x] Response time displayed; [x] Collapsible logs panel

Title: Internal Agent Chat
Description: As a user, I want to see agent-to-agent communication so that I understand how agents delegate and collaborate
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Separate WebSocket for internal chat; [x] Display agent delegation messages; [x] Show agent reasoning and decision-making; [x] Color-code messages by agent; [x] Trace full agent chain; [x] Optional toggle visibility

Title: Chat Context Persistence
Description: As a user, I want the chat to remember previous messages so that agents have context for follow-up questions
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Chat context passed with each message; [x] Sly data tracked across messages; [x] Context persists during session; [x] Clear history button to reset; [x] Context size limits enforced

Title: Component Library Sidebar
Description: As a user, I want to browse available tools in a sidebar so that I can discover what capabilities exist
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Floating sidebar toggleable from navigation; [x] 6 categories; [x] Collapsible folder structure with icons; [x] Tool cards with icon and name and description; [x] Tooltip showing full description on hover; [x] Search functionality across all tools

Title: Tool Search & Filter
Description: As a user, I want to search tools by name or description so that I can quickly find needed capabilities
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Search input at top of library; [x] Real-time filtering as user types; [x] Search matches tool name and description; [x] Clear search button; [x] No results message when empty; [x] Optional category filters

Title: MCP Marketplace
Description: As a user, I want to browse and add MCP servers so that my agents can integrate with external enterprise services
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Marketplace sidebar with 9+ servers; [x] Server cards with icon and name and description and capabilities; [x] Search servers by name or capability; [x] Add server to agent configuration; [x] Configure server parameters; [x] Test connection button with status indicator

Title: Drag-and-Drop Tool Addition
Description: As a user, I want to drag tools onto canvas so that I can add them to networks intuitively
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Tools draggable from library; [x] Drop onto canvas creates new tool node; [x] Node positioned at drop location; [x] Tool automatically configured with defaults; [x] Visual feedback during drag; [x] Cancel drag with ESC or drop outside canvas

Title: Execution Logs Panel
Description: As a user, I want to see detailed execution logs so that I can troubleshoot issues and understand agent behavior
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Collapsible panel at bottom of screen; [x] Log entries with timestamps; [x] Color coding by log level; [x] Auto-scroll to latest entry; [x] Search and filter logs by keyword; [x] Clear logs button; [x] Export logs to file

Title: Agent Chain Visualization
Description: As a user, I want to see the agent delegation chain so that I understand how agents collaborate
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Agent chain displayed as breadcrumb or sequential list; [x] Highlight active agents in canvas during execution; [x] Show handoff sequence between agents; [x] Color-code by agent type; [x] Click agent in chain to jump to node; [x] Updates in real-time during execution

Title: Performance Metrics Display
Description: As a user, I want to see performance metrics so that I can optimize my agent network
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Total LLM calls displayed; [x] Total response time shown; [x] Average response time calculated; [x] Token usage displayed; [x] Metrics update in real-time; [x] Reset metrics button

Title: Token Accounting
Description: As a user, I want to see token usage per message so that I can estimate costs and optimize prompts
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Input tokens counted and displayed; [x] Output tokens counted and displayed; [x] Total tokens per message; [x] Cumulative token usage for session; [x] Cost estimation optional; [x] Token usage shown in logs with each entry

Title: Floating Sidebars System
Description: As a user, I want smooth slide-in sidebars so that the interface feels polished and professional
Acceptance Criteria: [x] 5 floating sidebars implemented; [x] Slide-in and out animations; [x] Backdrop blur effect when sidebar open; [x] Click outside sidebar to close; [x] ESC key closes active sidebar; [x] Only one sidebar open at a time

Title: Loading States & Spinners
Description: As a user, I want to see loading indicators so that I know the application is working and not frozen
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Network loading spinner during initial load; [x] AI is typing indicator in chat; [x] WebSocket connecting state displayed; [x] Button loading states; [x] Skeleton screens for lists; [x] Progress bars for long operations

Title: Error Handling UI
Description: As a user, I want clear error messages so that I know what went wrong and how to fix it
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Toast notifications for transient errors; [x] Inline error messages in forms; [x] Error boundaries for component crashes; [x] User-friendly error text; [x] Suggested actions when applicable; [x] Retry buttons for network errors

Title: Modal Dialog System
Description: As a user, I want consistent modal dialogs so that confirmations and forms follow familiar patterns
Acceptance Criteria: [x] Backdrop overlay with blur effect; [x] Centered modal with clean border; [x] Header section with title and close button; [x] Body content area with padding; [x] Footer with action buttons; [x] ESC key closes modal; [x] Click outside closes modal
